publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4301 Susan Deacon: OKtoAsk Gateway Helpline—That the Parliament welcomes the recent launch of the OKtoAsk Gateway helpline, which will improve access to information and support for parents across Scotland; congratulates Parenting Across Scotland’s partner organisations, One Parent Families Scotland, Capability Scotland, Children 1st, the Scottish Adoption Association, Couple Counselling Scotland and the Aberlour Childcare Trust, on this initiative; commends Scotland’s parents for the work that they do in bringing up the next generation; recognises that parenting and family life in modern societies is demanding, and believes that a tapestry of information and support should be available to parents across Scotland. Supported by: Margaret Smith*, Mike Pringle*, Bruce Crawford*, Chris Ballance*, Maureen Macmillan*, Jackie Baillie*, Marlyn Glen*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*

S2M-4301 OKtoAsk Gateway Helpline (lodged on 26 April 2006) Brian Adam*, Shiona Baird*, Scott Barrie*, Sarah Boyack*, Bill Butler*, Alex Fergusson*, Cathie Craigie*, Trish Godman*, Patrick Harvie*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Christine May*, Eleanor Scott*, Tommy Sheridan*, Fiona Hyslop*, Donald Gorrie*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Rosie Kane*

S2M-4301 Susan Deacon: OKtoAsk Gateway Helpline—That the Parliament welcomes the recent launch of the OKtoAsk Gateway helpline, which will improve access to information and support for parents across Scotland; congratulates Parenting Across Scotland’s partner organisations, One Parent Families Scotland, Capability Scotland, Children 1st, the Scottish Adoption Association, Couple Counselling Scotland and the Aberlour Childcare Trust, on this initiative; commends Scotland’s parents for the work that they do in bringing up the next generation; recognises that parenting and family life in modern societies is demanding, and believes that a tapestry of information and support should be available to parents across Scotland. Supported by: Margaret Smith, Mike Pringle, Bruce Crawford, Chris Ballance, Maureen Macmillan, Jackie Baillie, Marlyn Glen, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Brian Adam, Shiona Baird, Scott Barrie, Sarah Boyack, Bill Butler, Alex Fergusson, Cathie Craigie, Trish Godman, Patrick Harvie, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Christine May, Eleanor Scott, Tommy Sheridan, Fiona Hyslop, Donald Gorrie, Marilyn Livingstone, Rosie Kane, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-4301 OKtoAsk Gateway Helpline (lodged on 26 April 2006) Dr Jean Turner*, Mr David Davidson*
S2M-4301 OKtoAsk Gateway Helpline (lodged on 26 April 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-4301 OKtoAsk Gateway Helpline (lodged on 26 April 2006) Robin Harper*
S2M-4301 OKtoAsk Gateway Helpline (lodged on 26 April 2006) Irene Oldfather*
